title: SeeBiscuit
author: SeeBiscuit
created_time: March 13, 2023, 08:11:28 AMLast edit: May 08, 2024, 08:42:10 AM by SeeBiscuit

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Meta is about what is related to this forum, it is not what is related to you. If you want to post about you or other members, go to reputation board for it. Congratulations.About my ranking up, it was easy and fast for me to get a hero merit which was my intention, but I still always enjoy this forum.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 13, 2023, 09:28:40 AMEdit: Oop! It appears the topic was moved for me by a wonderful moderator. Thanks, admin! Â Your topic was moved because someone reported it, moderators in most cases do not act in a way to moderate something by themselves. In addition, there are moderators, global moderators and admins, and they have different powers on the forum.And yes, we also have a special thread for those who want to celebrate some of their achievements on the forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 13, 2023, 11:32:24 AMQuote from: Lucius on March 13, 2023, 10:24:49 AMAnd yes, we also have a special thread for those who want to celebrate some of their achievements on the forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0I see. This is all good to know, thank you! ðŸ˜ƒIâ€™ll definitely be sure to check that thread out.the thread that Lucius referred you to was started for reason that not every user would open a separate topic for their achievements. so it's not an obligation, just moderating the forum so that others don't have to be buried about how someone reached a certain number of posts, merits, rank, etc...Regardless, I congratulate you on your progress.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: OP, congrats on your new ranking. looks like you enjoyed it. yours is pretty fast. continue your good work.by the way, you already made a post in the suggested thread. looks like you need to lock this thread, and thanks for sharing your story. this will certainly be a motivation for those who think it's impossible to rank up in a short time.Quote from: SeeBiscuit on March 13, 2023, 08:11:28 AMSr. Member here I come!I will look forward to it when next time you will open and update this thread of yours with your other achievements.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Great job, buddy.Forward and higher to get closer to your goals. The next rank won't be long in coming.237 days - the path is not close, but doable. You were able to do it and the number of days spent is no longer significantOf course, there are fond memories. It was Full member that made me feel that a rank increase was possible. Exactly how long it took me to get this rank, I don't remember. That's what my first avatar was like, if I'm not mistaken, it was an image of a ledger hardware wallet. Then I didn't know yet that this company would get into a big mess with a data leak and set up its users great. And, 2 times. Otherwise, it would not even have arisen in my thoughts to put that avatar.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 13, 2023, 11:44:27 AMthe thread that Lucius referred you to was started for reason that not every user would open a separate topic for their achievements. so it's not an obligation, just moderating the forum so that others don't have to be buried about how someone reached a certain number of posts, merits, rank, etc...Regardless, I congratulate you on your progress.OP can have one for him, it's not big deal to me although I tend to agree when all users reaching new milestone are willing to announced in the same thread for better moderation. I agree that it's not mandatory, but things like this are much better so reputation boards don't have so many achievement thread.The thread self-moderated by BitcoinGirl.Club has been quite active [13 pages] since its creation, so I think a lot of user have noticed and most user have been there to announce the milestone. Nevertheless, good job OP - congrats on your achievement.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Congratulations SeeBiscuit, for reaching the Full Member Rank. I know those feelings. I got the Full Member rank two months ago and reached the Sr. member rank last week. It's not easy when you desperately want to reach the next level. But, You are passionate about something. You won't realize that time is going fast and you will reach the desired rank. I see you are too excited about your rank-up. I saw you write good posts in Bitcoin Discussion threads. Sometimes joining Signature campaigns drops the post quality drastically. I hope it won't happen to you. I hope the new rank gave you a considerable boost inside.

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Thank you for becoming a full member. Because after a long wait you now have a long goal to reach the rank of senior member. Because your post quality is very good that you need to work harder to reach senior position.I myself understand the desire to reach full membership because it takes a lot of effort to reach. But we are very happy to see you reach full membership. Go further.
